amendment.description: Amendment deletes language which prohibits property from being categorized as a wetland based solely on the use of such land by migratory birds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 25 in the Congressional Record of May 9) to prohibit property from being designated as wetland based solely on the likelihood that migratory birds might use it.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gilchrest amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
